alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 8:25PM MDT until July 03 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Campbell County in northeastern Wyoming... Central Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 824 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles south of Rockypoint to 6 miles northeast of Rozet, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sundance, Moorcroft, Pine Haven, Hulett, Alva, Carlile, Oshoto, New Haven, Devils Tower National Monument, Warren Peak, Inyan Kara Mountain, Bear Lodge Campground, Cook Lake, Devils Tower Junction and Keyhole Reservoir. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 140 and 191. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
